Body: I have a first edition MOTOX phone.  I installed a qwikcart app called APPLEJACK.  It was working fine.  I installed the applejack update from Google Play and now it never connects to the server!  I emailed qwikcart a month ago and they did not respond. Is there a website that keeps the first editions of all android apps that can be downloaded and installed?  If so, what is the URL?
Title: Is there a website that keeps the first editions of all android apps that can be downloaded and installed?

history.Text: I have a first edition MOTOX phone.  I installed a qwikcart app called APPLEJACK.  It was working fine.  I installed the applejack update from Google Play and now it never connects to the server!  I emailed qwikcart a month ago and they did not respond. Is there a website that keeps the first editions of all android apps that can be downloaded and installed?  If so, what is the URL?
Is there a website that keeps the first editions of all android apps that can be downloaded and installed?
